content.question: Imagine that you are making an oral presentation to your Japanese class. First, you will read and hear the topic for your presentation. Then you will have 2 minutes to record your presentation. Your presentation should be as full as possible. Present your own view or perspective on Japanese housing and buildings. Discuss at least FIVE aspects or examples of Japanese housing and buildings. Begin with an appropriate introduction, give details, explain your own view or perspective, and end with a concluding remark.
